TABLE.NAME: tiny_autosave
TABLE.COMMENT: The content of the textarea saved during autosave operations

FIELD.NAME: elementid
FIELD.COMMENT: The unique id for the text editor in the form.

FIELD.NAME: contextid
FIELD.COMMENT: The contextid that the form was loaded with.

FIELD.NAME: pagehash
FIELD.COMMENT: The HTML DOM id of the page that loaded the form.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that loaded the form.

FIELD.NAME: draftid
FIELD.COMMENT: Optional draft area id containing draft files.

FIELD.NAME: pageinstance
FIELD.COMMENT: The browser tab instance that last saved the draft text. This is to prevent multiple tabs from the same user saving different text alternately.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Store the last modified time for the auto save text.

KEY.NAME: autosave_uniq_key
KEY.COMMENT: Unique key for the user in the form in the page.
